name: Snail Racing
description:
Exploration action game made for Ludum Dare '38; Theme: A Small World

Think you have what it takes to be a snail? Prove it! Take on the life of a snail trying to race its way to the top!

Get to the checkered goal before time runs out:

  • Space (Hold it!) : Enter shell to deflect projectiles.
  • W : Slug on forward
  • A/D: Turn that sluggo around!
  • M: Toggle mute
  • Q+T: Quit Game
